thag5.10:5.3: They’re as far from the true teaching
thag5.10:5.4: as the earth is from the sky.
thag5.10:6.3: They fall away from the true teaching,
thag5.10:6.4: like the moon in the waning fortnight.
thag5.10:7.3: They wither away in the true teaching,
thag5.10:7.4: like a fish in too little water.
thag5.10:8.3: They don’t thrive in the true teaching,
thag5.10:8.4: like a rotten seed in a field.
thag5.10:9.2: who listens to the victor’s instruction—
